entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 9:06 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High 13. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:06 PM MDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low plus 2.
